title: "HT1"
output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("movies.csv")

```

```{r}
topbudget <- order(df$budget, decreasing = T)
```

```{r}
df[topbudget,c("title",("budget"))]
```

```{r}
toprevenue <- order(df$revenue, decreasing = T)
```


```{r}
df[toprevenue,c("title","revenue")]
```



```{r}
topcount <- order(df$voteCount, decreasing = T)
```

```{r}
df[topcount,c("title","voteCount")]

```


```{r}
leastLiked <- order(df$voteAvg,decreasing = F)

```

```{r}
df[leastLiked,c("title","voteAvg")]
```



```{r}
dv = as.Date(df$releaseDate,"%Y")
```

```{r}
year <- as.numeric(format(dv,"%Y"))

```

```{r}
plot(x = year, xlab = "Nivel educativo", ylab = "Frecuencia",)
```
